attributes.action: inform him that his people are all suffering in silence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am an 18 year old girl who has had bulimia for 5 yearsand the nhs keep fobbing me off and i feel like i am going to die this way i am scared because all my family and friends can see me deteriorate in front of them and i feel helpless There must be loads of young women out there and men with the same problem and i feel like im not being noticed by the nhs!!

rejection.details:
Unfortunately your petition can not be accepted as the title does not request the PM or government do anything. Please reword your petition so that it calls for a recognisable action. You may want to try writing: "Guarantee that sufferers of bulimia get adequate access to ongoing help." 
Alternatively you could write to the NHS directly, or visit a site like Beat for more information and support: http://www.b-eat.co.uk/Home
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
